Komisi D: Anggaran Konsultan Kampung Kumuh Pemprov DKI Janggal
04 Nov 2019, 15:13 by iman


Komisi D: Anggaran Konsultan Kampung Kumuh Pemprov DKI Janggal

KBRN, Jakarta : Setelah masalah anggaran pengadaan lem aibon senilai Rp 82 miliar menjadi polemik di masyarakat. Kini muncul soal anggaran konsultan penataan Rukun Warga (RW) perumahan kumuh di Jakarta yang dinilai janggal. Sekretaris Komisi D DPRD DKI Jakarta, Syarif melihat ada kejanggalan seputar kenaikan anggaran konsultan kampung kumuh satu Rukum Warga (RW) di Jakarta yang hampir Rp600 juta. Padahal tahun sebelumnya tiap RW mendapatkan Rp 375 juta. "Tahun lalu per RW Rp400 juta jadi Rp 375juta kena pajak. Sekarang Rp600 juta, dikalikan berapa , 77 RW. Kenaikan 20x lipat. Kita minta efisiensi,"kata Syarif di Gedung DPRD Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019). Untuk itu, ia meminta pemerintah provinsi DKI Jakarta memperbaiki anggaran konsultan penataan Rukun Warga di DKI Jakarta ini.  Ia meminta Pemprov DKI Jakarta transparan dalam masalah ini dan alasan anggarannya bisa naik di tahun ini. "Mereka akan memaparkan ulang besok. Seperti apa postur yg bener. Klo diperhatikan flat 600 terus unik juga. Anggaran kok flat, kan RW macam-macam. Kok bisa? Perencanaan harus diperbaiki,"tegasnya. Terkait masalah ini, Komisi D DPRD DKI Jakarta rencananya Selasa besok akan menggelar rapat komisi. Rapat ini digelar untuk mendengarkan pemaparan Dinas Perumahan DKI Jakarta. Selain itu, Komisi D meminta agar anggaran tersebut dapat digunakan secara efektif dan akuntabel. "Dinas perumahan mengatakan ada penambahan surveyor, tukang ketik, terus makan minum. Tahun lalu bisa kok sekarang enggak bisa. Itu usulan SKPD bukan Bapedda," tandasnya.

Commission D: DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's Slum Village Consultant Budget
Nov. 04, 2019, 15:13 by faith


Commission D: DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's Slum Village Consultant Budget

KBRN, Jakarta: After the budget issue of procuring aibon glue worth Rp 82 billion, it became a polemic in the community. Now comes the matter of the sluggish housing consultant (RW) budget for slum housing in Jakarta, which is considered odd. The Secretary of Commission D of DKI Jakarta DPRD, Syarif, sees that there are irregularities surrounding the increase in the budget of the consultant slum of the one Rukum Warga (RW) slum in Jakarta, which is almost Rp. 600 million. Whereas the previous year, each RW received Rp. 375 million. "Last year, Rp. 400 million per RW to Rp. 375 million was taxable. Now it is Rp. 600 million, multiplied by 77 RW. 20x increase. We ask for efficiency," Syarif said at the Jakarta DPRD Building, Monday (11/04/2019). For this reason, he asked the DKI Jakarta provincial government to improve the budget for the consultant's arrangement for the Five Pillars in DKI Jakarta. He asked the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government to be transparent in this matter and the reason for the budget increase this year. "They will explain again tomorrow. What kind of posture is correct. If you pay attention to flat 600, it continues to be unique too. How come the budget is flat, RW is all sorts of things. How come? Planning must be improved," he said. Related to this issue, Commission D DKI Jakarta DPRD is planned to hold a commission meeting on Tuesday. This meeting was held to listen to the presentation of DKI Jakarta Housing Agency. In addition, Commission D requested that the budget be used effectively and accountably. "The housing agency said there were additional surveyors, typists, and continued to eat and drink. Last year it could be or not now. That was the recommendation of the SKPD not Bapedda," he said.
